General, Haryana.
****
K. Kannan, J (oral).
.
 RFA No.2829 is against the order passed
under Section 30 of the Land Acquisition Act raising a dispute of
apportionment of the amount of compensation determined by the
Collector. The amount is in the range of `1800/-. Counsel for the
RFA No. 2829 of 1986 
RFA No. 286 of 1987
appellant states that notice to the parties has come back and that he
has no instructions.
.
RFA No.2829 is dismissed for default.
.
RFA No.286 of 1987 is also dismissed for
default.
(K. KANNAN)
 JUDGE 
July 9, 2012
archana
